Others: The Mets committed four errors in three NLCS games.
Luis Severino was named an NL Gold Glove finalist on Tuesday.
Tyrone Taylor made a sliding grab and narrowly avoided a disastrous collision with right fielder Starling Marte.
Tyrone Taylor's advanced metrics in center field were unremarkable in 273 regular-season innings (0 DRS and 1 OAA) this season, but he has 8 DRS and 6 OAA in his career in center.
